name: TURN IN YOUR PSET
description:
TURN IN YOUR PSET is a short (~5 min) piece of interactive fiction about being alive right now, especially when there are assignments due. 

this game was made in about a month (feb-march 2021) in between doing actual work during my last semester of college. my friend michael wrote the amazing music and somehow managed to do his work, too. 

thank you for playing!

p.s. if you happen to be an employer and you like what you see, drop me a line  : ]

Words, Art, and Code by Isabel Lee (website, twitter)

Music by Michael Chang (youtube, twitter)

Made using Godot Engine and Procreate 

Sound effects: jsfxr,  Noises.Online (under a CC 3.0 BY license), and SampleFocus
